Package org.drools.brms.client.common

Interface Summary
CompletionItemsAsync  
CompletionItemsAsyncReturn  
DirtyableContainer  
DirtyableWidget  
IDirtyable  
 

Class Summary
AssetFormats Keeps track of the different rule formats we support.
AutoCompleteTextBoxAsync This nifty utility provides auto completion.
DatePicker  
DirtyableComposite  
DirtyableFlexTable  
DirtyableHorizontalPane  
DirtyableVerticalPane  
ErrorPopup Generic error dialog popup.
FieldEditListener This is a utility listener for trapping text field edits, and can be used for instance to stretch the size of a text box.
FormStyleLayout This form style class is to be extended to provide "form style" dialogs (eg in a popup).
FormStylePopup This builds on the FormStyleLayout for providing common popup features in a columnar form layout, with a title and a large (ish) icon.
GenericCallback This is a generic call back that handles errors (very simply).
HTMLFileManagerFields This is a central location for all form fields use in HTML forms for submission to the file servlet.
ImageButton Really just an image, but tacks on the image-Button style name.
InfoPopup This is handy for in-place context help.
Lbl Little helper class to decorate vanilla labels with style.
LoadingPopup Generic "busy" dialog popup.
RulePackageSelector A rule package selector widget.
StatusChangePopup Well this one should be pretty obvious what it does.
ValidationMessageWidget This presents validation error messages to the user, from the server side.
WarningPopup Generic warning message popup.
YesNoDialog A simple confirmation dialog.
